title: User Sign-Up Flow
description: Verify that new users can successfully sign up using the Clerk authentication sign-up page with all required fields and validations.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-up page.
Fill out the sign-up form with valid email, username, and password.
Submit the sign-up form.
Confirm that the user is redirected to the authenticated landing page or Battle Mode interface.
Verify that the user session is established and persists.

title: User Sign-In Flow
description: Verify that returning users can successfully sign in through Clerk authentication with valid credentials and access protected routes.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-in page.
Input valid existing user email and password.
Submit the sign-in form.
Confirm successful authentication and redirection to Battle Mode interface.
Verify session is active and protected pages are accessible.

title: User Sign-In with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that the system prevents sign-in with invalid credentials and displays appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-in page.
Enter invalid email or password combinations.
Attempt to submit the sign-in form.
Verify that sign-in fails and an error notification is shown.
Ensure user remains on the sign-in page.

title: Real-Time Streaming of AI Responses
description: Validate that the AI Battle Mode streams responses from GPT-5-Nano, Grok-4, and DeepSeek v3.1 simultaneously with a visible typewriter effect and minimal latency.

steps.description: Sign in and enter Battle Mode.
Enter a chat prompt and submit it.
Verify that all three AI responses begin streaming simultaneously side-by-side.
Check that streaming text displays a typewriter effect.
Confirm minimal latency between each AI response start.

title: Multi-Turn Conversation Context Preservation
description: Verify that conversation context is preserved across multiple turns allowing continuous dialogue with AI models.

steps.description: Start a new chat and submit an initial prompt.
Submit follow-up prompts continuing the dialogue.
Check that AI responses reflect context from previous turns.
Confirm no loss of conversation history during interaction.

title: Chat Input with Text, Image, and Document Attachments via Drag and Drop
description: Test that the advanced chat input accepts and correctly processes text input, image uploads, and document attachments using both manual selection and drag-and-drop methods.

steps.description: Navigate to Battle Mode chat input.
Input text and submit a message.
Confirm text is accepted and processed correctly.
Upload an image file via drag and drop.
Verify image is accepted, previewed, and sent with the message.
Upload a document attachment via manual file selector.
Check document is accepted, previewed if applicable, and sent.

title: Fallback Vision Description for Non-Vision AI Models
description: Ensure that for AI models without vision support, intelligent fallback text descriptions of images are provided for processing.

steps.description: Upload an image attachment with a prompt.
For models that lack vision input, verify fallback textual description is generated and included in the prompt.
Check that AI responses are generated appropriately using the fallback description.

title: Chat History Storage and Retrieval with Supabase
description: Validate that chat conversations are persistently stored in Supabase and can be retrieved accurately with user sessions.

steps.description: Sign in and conduct multiple AI chat sessions.
Navigate to profile page to view chat history.
Verify all previous chats are listed with correct timestamps and metadata.
Select a chat and confirm proper display of conversation content.

title: Chat History Search, Filter, Pagination, and Bulk Delete
description: Verify that users can search, filter, paginate through chat history and perform bulk deletion actions with consistent data state.

steps.description: Navigate to profile page with populated chat history.
Use the search bar to filter chats by keyword.
Confirm displayed chats match the search terms.
Apply filters such as date range or AI model type.
Verify filtered chats update accordingly.
Navigate through pages of chat history using pagination controls.
Confirm pagination loads distinct sets of chats.
Select multiple chats and perform bulk delete action.
Verify selected chats are removed and data consistency is maintained.

title: Voting on AI Responses Upvote and Downvote
description: Check that users can upvote and downvote AI model responses and that these votes are recorded and persist correctly.

steps.description: Enter Battle Mode chat with AI responses displayed.
Click upvote button on one AI model response.
Confirm that vote is registered and UI reflects upvote state.
Click downvote button on a different AI response.
Verify downvote is recorded and visually marked.
Refresh page and ensure votes persist.

title: Share Battle Results on Social Media and Copy Link
description: Validate that users can share AI battle results through social media platforms and copy shareable links to the clipboard successfully.

steps.description: Complete a chat battle and open the share modal.
Click social media share buttons (e.g., Twitter, Facebook).
Confirm social share dialog opens with correct content.
Click 'Copy Link' button.
Verify link is copied to clipboard and toast notification confirms success.

title: Keyboard Shortcuts Functionality
description: Verify that configured keyboard shortcuts (submit, clear input, new chat) trigger the intended actions without conflicts or errors.

steps.description: Focus on chat input field.
Press the submit shortcut key.
Confirm message is submitted successfully.
Press the clear input shortcut key.
Verify chat input is cleared.
Press the new chat shortcut key.
Confirm new chat session is initialized and input cleared.

title: Toast Notifications for Success and Error Feedback
description: Verify that toast notifications appear appropriately for user actions such as message submit success, upload errors, or vote submissions, and that they disappear after a timeout or on manual dismissal.

steps.description: Perform an action such as submitting a chat message.
Confirm a success toast notification appears.
Trigger an error by uploading an unsupported file format.
Verify an error toast notification is shown.
Wait for toast notification to disappear automatically or dismiss it manually.
Confirm the toast notification is removed from view.

title: Animated Neon-Themed Background Rendering
description: Confirm that the neon-themed animated gradient backgrounds render smoothly with no flickering or visual artifacts across supported devices and screen sizes.

steps.description: Load landing page and Battle Mode interface on multiple device types.
Verify animated background gradients are visible and animated as expected.
Check for performance issues such as frame drops or flickering.

title: Loading Skeletons During Data Fetching
description: Ensure loading skeleton components are displayed appropriately during chat history loading and AI response streaming to improve user experience.

steps.description: Navigate to profile with large chat history and trigger data fetch.
Confirm loading skeleton placeholders are shown until data loads.
Submit a chat prompt and observe AI response streaming.
Verify loading skeleton or animation displays before streaming text begins.

title: SEO Metadata and Sitemap Validation
description: Verify that landing and static informational pages contain proper SEO metadata, Open Graph tags, sitemap is generated correctly, and robots.txt has expected rules.

steps.description: Access landing page and inspect HTML head for SEO metadata.
Confirm page title, description, keywords, and Open Graph image tags are present.
Navigate to sitemap.xml.
Verify sitemap contains all accessible URLs.
Access robots.txt.
Confirm expected crawl rules are listed for search engines.

title: Protected Routes Access Restriction for Unauthenticated Users
description: Validate that unauthenticated users attempting to access Battle Mode or Profile pages are redirected to sign-in page and cannot bypass authentication.

steps.description: Open a new incognito browser window.
Attempt to navigate directly to Battle Mode chat URL.
Verify user is redirected to sign-in page.
Attempt to access profile page directly.
Ensure redirection to sign-in occurs without access.

title: Handling Network Failures During API Calls
description: Test system behavior when key API calls to Supabase or AI services fail due to network issues, verifying graceful error handling and user feedback.

steps.description: Simulate network failure or API downtime during chat history fetch.
Confirm appropriate error message or toast notification is shown.
Simulate failure during AI response streaming request.
Verify failure is handled gracefully without app crash and user is informed.

title: Consistency of Keyboard Shortcut Behavior Across Browsers
description: Verify that keyboard shortcuts perform consistently without conflicts or unexpected behavior across supported browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Safari).

steps.description: Test each keyboard shortcut in Chrome.
Verify all shortcuts trigger intended actions.
Repeat shortcut testing on Firefox, Edge, and Safari.
Confirm consistent shortcut behavior with no discrepancies.

title: Bulk Select/Deselect and Consistent UI State in Chat History
description: Validate that bulk selection checkboxes in chat history work correctly to select and deselect multiple conversations with accurate UI state updates.

steps.description: Navigate to chat history page with multiple conversation entries.
Use bulk select checkbox to select all conversations.
Verify all conversations show selected state.
Deselect individual conversations.
Confirm bulk select checkbox updates to indicate partial selection.
Use bulk deselect to clear all selections.
Verify all checkboxes are cleared and UI reflects this.
